title: Gottlieb -All Ball – KD out to make a statement; Lonzo behind the learning curve; Jimmy Butler drama; NBA Western Conference preview with guest Ric Bucher
itunes:title: Gottlieb -All Ball – KD out to make a statement; Lonzo behind the learning curve; Jimmy Butler drama; NBA Western Conference preview with guest Ric Bucher
description:
Subscribe here to the All Ball with Doug Gottlieb Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/all-ball-with-doug-gottlieb/id1358843497?mt=2. All Ball with Doug Gottlieb is part of the Colin Cowherd Podcast Network. All Ball is an unfiltered podcast covering the biggest stories in college basketball and the NBA. Join Doug as he brings his unique perspective as a TV analyst and radio host. Join us this week as Doug discusses whether KD wants to make a statement that he's the NBA's top player, why Lonzo Ball is behind the learning curve heading into his second season, Jimmy Butler drama, and a Western Conference preview with special guest, Senior Bleacher Report NBA writer Ric Bucher. Follow Doug on Twitter at @GottliebShow and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
